attributes.action: ensure that front line troops in all fields of conflict recieve the funding and support that they deserve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years now, funding for the UK Armed Forces appears to have been misappropriated. Front line troops in all fields of conflict have been forgotten when it comes to the assignment of funds. They need to be at the forefront of defence budgeting. They also need all the support they can be given. So will the PM do they honourable thing, and allow them the funding to operate with the correct, modern equipment?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
